Sql.CDATA: -- table UsrPMCostReassignment IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = N'dbo' AND TABLE_NAME = N'UsrPMCostReassignment') BEGIN PRINT 'Create table UsrPMCostReassignment' CREATE TABLE [dbo].UsrPMCostReassignment( [CompanyID] [int] NOT NULL ,[PMReassignmentID] [char] (10) NOT NULL ,[BranchID] [int] NOT NULL ,[Description] [nvarchar](60) NULL ,[Active] [bit] NOT NULL ,[RevID] [int] NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 ,[NoteID] [uniqueidentifier] NULL ,[CreatedByID] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL ,[Tstamp] [timestamp] NULL ,[CreatedByScreenID] [char](8) NOT NULL ,[CreatedDateTime] [datetime] NOT NULL ,[LastModifiedByID] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL ,[LastModifiedDateTime] [datetime] NOT NULL ,[LastModifiedByScreenID] [char](8) NOT NULL CONSTRAINT [PK_UsrPMCostReassignment] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [CompanyID] ASC, [PMReassignmentID] ASC ) WITH ( PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON )) END
